name: MoreCompany
description: TThis mod is a lobby player count expansion mod. It increases the max player count. The mod is specifically designed for 8 players. Not every UI modification will properly accomodate for above 8 players.

name: BiggerLobby
description: The original lobby expansion mod! Now with up to 40 players!

name: HDLethalCompany
description: Additional graphics settings such as resolution, anti-aliasing, fog quality etc.

name: LateCompany
description: A mod to allow players to join after the game starts.

name: More Suits
description: Adds more suits to choose from, and allows you to customize them!

name: HullBreaker Company
description: Making it more challenging to work for the company

name: ReservedWalkieSlot
description: Gives a free, dedicated Walkie slot on the right side of your screen. You can press [X] to activate and speak into the Walkie at anytime.

name: Helmet Cameras
description: For monitoring first person cameras on player's helmets. For best 'Camera Man' experience.

name: ShipLoot
description: Reliably shows the total value of all scrap in your ship.
